group.label: Online checkout
group.comment: Use these components to establish a more pleasant experience and stimulate brand recognition among shoppers during the checkout process.

field.label: Payment method rendering in checkout
field.tooltip: Determines whether the payment methods will be displayed with its logo or just the name.

field.label: Checkout return path
field.tooltip: The path the customer will be redirected to when payment was not successful. Default is checkout/cart.

field.label: House number in checkout (address street field)
field.tooltip: Select which of the address lines will be the house number. Make sure to enable enough "Number of Lines in a Street Address" in Magento's Customer Configuration

group.label: Headless integration
group.comment:

field.label: Payment Origin URL
field.tooltip: Only relevant if you process payments from an external URL different to that of Magento

field.label: Payment Return URL
field.tooltip: The URL that redirect payment methods will return to after the shopper completes a payment in a 3rd party gateway. Default return URL endpoint is {YOUR_MAGENTO_BASE_URL}/adyen/return

field.label: Custom Success Redirect Path
field.tooltip: Only relevant if the success path of your headless integration is not "checkout/onepage/success". If set, this will add the Order Increment ID as a query parameter.
